data.name: I Expect You To Die 2
data.description:
The encore to I Expect You To Die is here...

Welcome back, Agent! Zoraxis believes you are dead. To capitalize on this moment, we are sending you deep undercover to explore some diabolical intelligence the Agency has received regarding Zoraxis‚Äô move for world domination. Here‚Äôs what we can tell you now...your first mission is to protect the prime minister, who is attending a theater production featuring world-famous actor and celebrity John Juniper. 

Agent, we need you to:
‚Üí Use your ever-present power of telekinesis to solve puzzles, escape dangerous situations, and manipulate objects
‚Üí Go undercover using disguises to figure out exactly what Zoraxis is up to
‚Üí Not die

What to ‚ÄòExpect‚Äô in I Expect You To Die 2: The Spy and the Liar (besides...you know üíÄ):
‚ú¶ Embark on six new missions
‚ú¶ Immerse yourself in a super spy story
‚ú¶ Start your adventure with a new 360¬∞ intro sequence
‚ú¶ Meet John Juniper, voiced by Wil Wheaton
‚ú¶ Play in comfort
‚ú¶ Get more of everything

Join our Discord!

translations.display_name: I Expect You To Die 2: de spion en de leugenaar
translations.long_description:
Welkom terug, Agent! Op dit moment denkt Zoraxis dat je dood bent. Om gebruik te maken van dit moment, sturen we je diep undercover om duivelse informatie te onderzoeken die het Bureau heeft ontvangen over Zoraxis' plannen voor wereldheerschappij. Dit is wat we je nu kunnen vertellen... Je eerste missie is om de premier te beschermen, die een theaterproductie bijwoont met de wereldberoemde acteur en beroemdheid John Juniper. 

We hebben je nodig:
‚Üí Gebruik je altijd aanwezige telekinetische kracht om puzzels op te lossen, te ontsnappen uit gevaarlijke situaties en objecten te manipuleren
‚Üí Ga undercover met vermommingen om erachter te komen wat Zoraxis precies van plan is
‚Üí Ga niet dood

Wat je kunt verwachten in I Expect You To Die 2 (naast... je weet wel):
‚óè	Ga op zes nieuwe missies 
‚óè	Dompel jezelf onder in een superspionverhaal
‚óè	Begin je avontuur met een gloednieuwe 360¬∞ intro 

I Expect You To Die 2: de spion en de leugenaar is alleen in Engels verkrijgbaar.
translations.short_description: Word een elite superspion, klaar voor spionage, explosieven en gadgets in overvloed. Deze populaire ontsnap-uit-de-kamer VR-franchise is terug met meer ingenieuze puzzels, sluwe schurken en gevaarlijke locaties.

changelog.change_log:
Patch Notes:

* Fixed minor visual issues in the tutorial and Operation: Eaves Drop.
* Made it harder to lose items behind the large barrel in Operation: Party Crasher
* Operation: Stage Fright progresses as intended even if the electro-lift for the clock isn‚Äôt fully in the up position, the main curtain is opened and then re-locked, or the * curtain is opened after the gas is released.
* Improved the functionality of the telekinesis beam when switching between close and far objects.
* The world leaders‚Äô voice lines now play at the appropriate time.
* The laser cage visual effects now play at the appropriate time.
* Operation: Rising Phoenix progresses as intended even if the lever for opening doors is partially opened.
* Souvenir display before missions are completed has been updated to remove redundant information.
* Explosive crates now explode when hit by missiles.
* Unlocking the navigation puzzle in Operation: Jet Set no longer kills the player at the wrong times.
